content:
As a result of enemy artillery shelling in Gulyaypol, two women were injured in Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Regional Military Administration Ivan Fedorov.

In total, the enemy made 405 beats on 11 settlements during the day.

"The Rashists made 9 RSZV-arrows of the railway, Novodanylivka, Novoandriivka and Robovyki, as well as attacked 92 drones of Gulyaypole, Levadne, small Tokmachka, Novoandriivka, Novodanilovka, Malinivka and Malinivka,"-said Ivan Fedorov.

At the same time, 304 enemy artudaries came across the territory of Gulyaypol, Levadny, Malynivka, Magic, Small Tokmachka and other frontier cities and villages.

"There have been 11 reports on the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure," the head of the Zaporozhye Ova said.

As reportedArmyinform, in Kryvyi Rih, the rocket attack of the Russian Federation caught fire.
title: The occupiers fired 11 settlements in Zaporozhye: there are wounded
description: This was reported by the head of the Zaporizhzhya Regional Military Administration Ivan Fedorov. ...
author: Army Inform
